step_feedback.feedback: You did a good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your elbow a little straighter next time for maximum resistance.
Your fist was mostly tight, but try to really squeeze your muscles as you inhale. Keep that elbow straight!
Good job opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Remember to visualize the fluid moving out with each pump.
Excellent! You're really getting the hang of opening your hand wide and relaxing. Keep up the great work visualizing the fluid flow.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the overhead pumping! Focus on keeping your arm straight and squeezing your muscles tightly when you make a fist. Remember to relax fully as you open your hand to help move fluid.
